verbs.description: russian oligarchs [V: may] have directly funded donald trump 2016 campaign during the 2016 campaign donald trump repeatedly insisted that he would not be in the pocket of special interests — because he was too rich trump book lovers dmca kos liberation league senate mark sumner donald trump brett kavanaugh florida russia senator kos kos media gop
